item.description:
Hello,

One of the Wikimania planners is in town for a few days, so we're trying to take advantage of her presence here to do a lot of work on Wikimania.

We're gathering at Toscanini's in Central Square at 6:50 pm on Friday, April 28, for some ice cream and chatting. (Moved back slightly for people who have to be elsewhere at 8.)

Don't forget about the meeting at the Berkman Center for Internet & Society on Thursday, April 27, at 7 pm.

More info: http://en.wikipedia.o....

j

Come one, come all ! Talk about summer plans, conference speakers, and swimming holes...

For more information, see http://en.wikipedia.o...
item.name: Ice Cream with the Wikipedians!
